atk-s0501a1:2_0: Idāni yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇagamanaṁ, gamakañca vibhāvaye’’ti, tattha sabbadhammesu
atk-s0501a1:2_2: sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ vā saccābhisambodhimupādāya paññattito sattaviseso buddho. Yathāha –
atk-s0501a1:3_0: ‘‘Buddhoti yo so bhagavā sayambhū anācariyako pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni
atk-s0501a1:3_1: abhisambujjhi, tattha ca sabbaññutaṁ patto, balesu ca vasībhāva’’nti (mahāni. 192;
atk-s0501a1:5: Byañjanato pana ‘‘bujjhitāti buddho, bodhetāti buddho’’ti evamādinā nayena veditabbo. Vuttañcetaṁ –
atk-s0501a1:6_0: ‘‘Buddhoti kenaṭṭhena buddho? Bujjhitā saccānīti buddho, bodhetā pajāyāti buddho,
atk-s0501a1:6_1: sabbaññutāya buddho, sabbadassāvitāya buddho, anaññaneyyatāya buddho, vikasitāya
atk-s0501a1:6_2: buddho, khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddho, nirupakkilesasaṅkhātena buddho, ekantavītarāgoti
atk-s0501a1:6_3: buddho, ekantavītadosoti buddho, ekantavītamohoti buddho, ekantanikkilesoti buddho,
atk-s0501a1:6_4: ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddho, eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddho,
atk-s0501a1:6_5: abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddho. Buddhoti netaṁ nāmaṁ mātarā kataṁ, na pitarā
atk-s0501a1:6_6: kataṁ, na bhātarā kataṁ, na bhaginiyā kataṁ, na mittāmaccehi kataṁ, na ñātisālohitehi
atk-s0501a1:6_7: kataṁ, na samaṇabrāhmaṇehi kataṁ, na devatāhi kataṁ, vimokkhantikametaṁ buddhānaṁ
atk-s0501a1:6_8: bhagavantānaṁ bodhiyā mūle saha sabbaññutaññāṇassa paṭilābhā sacchikā paññatti yadidaṁ
atk-s0501a1:7_0: Ettha ca yathā loke avagantā avagatoti vuccati, evaṁ bujjhitā saccānīti buddho. Yathā
atk-s0501a1:7_1: paṇṇasosā vātā paṇṇasusāti vuccanti, evaṁ bodhetā pajāyāti buddho. Sabbaññutāya buddhoti
atk-s0501a1:7_2: sabbadhammabujjhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti. Sabbadassāvitāya buddhoti
atk-s0501a1:7_3: sabbadhammabodhanasamatthāya buddhiyā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti. Anaññaneyyatāya buddhoti
atk-s0501a1:7_4: aññena abodhito sayameva buddhattā buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti. Vikasitāya buddhoti nānāguṇavikasanato
atk-s0501a1:7_5: padumamiva vikasanaṭṭhena buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti. Khīṇāsavasaṅkhātena buddhoti evamādīhi
atk-s0501a1:7_7: buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti. Ekāyanamaggaṁ gatoti buddhoti buddhiyatthānaṁ gamanatthapariyāyato
atk-s0501a1:7_8: yathā maggaṁ gatopi puriso gatoti vuccati, evaṁ ekāyanamaggaṁ gatattāpi buddhoti
atk-s0501a1:7_9: vuccatīti dassetuṁ vuttaṁ. Eko anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhoti buddhoti
atk-s0501a1:7_10: na parehi buddhattā buddho, kintu sayameva anuttaraṁ sammāsambodhiṁ abhisambuddhattā
atk-s0501a1:7_11: buddhoti vuttaṁ hoti . Abuddhivihatattā buddhipaṭilābhā buddhoti buddhi buddhaṁ bodhoti
atk-s0501a1:7_12: pariyāyavacanametaṁ. Tattha yathā nīlarattaguṇayogato ‘‘nīlo paṭo, ratto paṭo’’ti
atk-s0501a1:7_13: vuccati, evaṁ buddhiguṇayogato buddhoti ñāpetuṁ vuttaṁ hoti. Tato paraṁ buddhoti
atk-s0501a1:7_14: netaṁ nāmanti evamādi atthamanugatā ayaṁ paññattīti bodhanatthaṁ vuttanti evarūpena
atk-s0501a1:7_15: nayena sabbesaṁ padānaṁ buddhasaddassa sādhanasamattho attho veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:10_0: Idāni saraṇagamanādīsu hiṁsatīti saraṇaṁ, saraṇagatānaṁ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṁ
atk-s0501a1:10_1: santāsaṁ dukkhaṁ duggatiṁ parikkilesaṁ hiṁsati vidhamati nīharati nirodhetīti attho.
atk-s0501a1:10_2: Atha vā hite pavattanena ahitā ca nivattanena sattānaṁ bhayaṁ hiṁsatīti buddho, bhavakantārā
atk-s0501a1:10_3: uttaraṇena assāsadānena ca dhammo, appakānampi kārānaṁ vipulaphalapaṭilābhakaraṇena
atk-s0501a1:10_4: saṅgho. Tasmā imināpi pariyāyena taṁ ratanattayaṁ saraṇaṁ. Tappasādataggarutāhi vihataviddhaṁsitakileso
atk-s0501a1:10_5: tapparāyaṇatākārappavatto aparappaccayo vā cittuppādo saraṇagamanaṁ. Taṁsamaṅgī satto
atk-s0501a1:10_6: taṁ saraṇaṁ gacchati, vuttappakārena cittuppādena ‘‘esa me saraṇaṁ, esa me parāyaṇa’’nti
atk-s0501a1:10_7: evametaṁ upetīti attho . Upento ca ‘‘ete mayaṁ, bhante, bhagavantaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāma,
atk-s0501a1:10_8: dhammañca, upāsake no bhagavā dhāretū’’ti tapussabhallikādayo viya samādānena vā,
atk-s0501a1:10_9: ‘‘satthā me, bhante, bhagavā, sāvakohamasmī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 2.154) mahākassapādayo
atk-s0501a1:10_10: viya sissabhāvūpagamanena vā, ‘‘evaṁ vutte brahmāyu brāhmaṇo uṭṭhāyāsanā ekaṁsaṁ
atk-s0501a1:10_11: uttarāsaṅgaṁ karitvā yena bhagavā tenañjaliṁ paṇāmetvā tikkhattuṁ udānaṁ udānesi
atk-s0501a1:10_12: ‘namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa. Namo tassa…pe… sammāsambuddhassā’’’ti
atk-s0501a1:10_13: (ma. ni. 2.388) brahmāyuādayo viya tappoṇattena vā, kammaṭṭhānānuyogino viya attasanniyyātanena
atk-s0501a1:10_14: vā, ariyapuggalā viya saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena vāti anekappakāraṁ visayato kiccato ca upeti.
atk-s0501a1:13_0: Idāni ‘‘bhedābhedaṁ phalañcāpi, gamanīyañca dīpaye’’ti vuttānaṁ bhedādīnaṁ ayaṁ dīpanā,
atk-s0501a1:13_1: evaṁ saraṇagatassa puggalassa duvidho saraṇagamanabhedo – sāvajjo ca anavajjo ca.
atk-s0501a1:13_2: Anavajjo kālakiriyāya, sāvajjo aññasatthari vuttappakārappavattiyā, tasmiñca vuttappakāraviparītappavattiyā.
atk-s0501a1:13_3: So duvidhopi puthujjanānameva. Buddhaguṇesu aññāṇasaṁsayamicchāñāṇappavattiyā anādarādippavattiyā
atk-s0501a1:13_4: ca tesaṁ saraṇaṁ saṁkiliṭṭhaṁ hoti. Ariyapuggalā pana abhinnasaraṇā ceva asaṁkiliṭṭhasaraṇā
atk-s0501a1:13_5: ca honti. Yathāha ‘‘aṭṭhānametaṁ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṁ diṭṭhisampanno puggalo
atk-s0501a1:13_6: aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddiseyyā’’ti (a. ni. 1.276; ma. ni. 3.128; vibha. 809). Puthujjanā
atk-s0501a1:13_7: tu yāvadeva saraṇabhedaṁ na pāpuṇanti, tāvadeva abhinnasaraṇā. Sāvajjova nesaṁ saraṇabhedo,
atk-s0501a1:13_8: saṁkileso ca aniṭṭhaphalado hoti. Anavajjo avipākattā aphalo, abhedo pana phalato
atk-s0501a1:15: ‘‘Yekeci buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gatāse, na te gamissanti apāyabhūmiṁ;
atk-s0501a1:16: Pahāya mānusaṁ dehaṁ, devakāyaṁ paripūressantī’’ti. (dī. ni. 2.332; saṁ. ni. 1.37);
atk-s0501a1:17: Tatra ca ye saraṇagamanupakkilesasamucchedena saraṇaṁ gatā, te apāyaṁ na gamissanti. Itare pana saraṇagamanena na gamissantīti evaṁ gāthāya adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:20_0: Gamanīyadīpanāyaṁ codako āha – ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti ettha yo buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ
atk-s0501a1:20_1: gacchati, esa buddhaṁ vā gaccheyya saraṇaṁ vā, ubhayathāpi ca ekassa vacanaṁ niratthakaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:20_2: Kasmā? Gamanakiriyāya kammadvayābhāvato. Na hettha ‘‘ajaṁ gāmaṁ netī’’tiādīsu viya
atk-s0501a1:21_0: ‘‘Gacchateva pubbaṁ disaṁ, gacchati pacchimaṁ disa’’ntiādīsu (saṁ. ni. 1.159; 3.87)
atk-s0501a1:21_1: viya sātthakamevāti ce? Na, buddhasaraṇānaṁ samānādhikaraṇabhāvassānadhippetato.
atk-s0501a1:21_2: Etesañhi samānādhikaraṇabhāve adhippete paṭihatacittopi buddhaṁ upasaṅkamanto buddhaṁ
atk-s0501a1:21_3: saraṇaṁ gato siyā. Yañhi taṁ buddhoti visesitaṁ saraṇaṁ, tamevesa gatoti. ‘‘Etaṁ
atk-s0501a1:21_4: kho saraṇaṁ khemaṁ, etaṁ saraṇamuttama’’nti (dha. pa. 192) vacanato samānādhikaraṇattamevāti
atk-s0501a1:21_5: ce? Na, tattheva tabbhāvato. Tattheva hi gāthāpade etaṁ buddhādiratanattayaṁ saraṇagatānaṁ
atk-s0501a1:21_7: ayaṁ samānādhikaraṇabhāvo adhippeto, aññattha tu gamisambandhe sati saraṇagamanassa
atk-s0501a1:21_8: appasiddhito anadhippetoti asādhakametaṁ. ‘‘Etaṁ saraṇamāgamma, sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti
atk-s0501a1:21_9: ettha gamisambandhepi saraṇagamanapasiddhito samānādhikaraṇattamevāti ce? Na pubbe
atk-s0501a1:21_10: vuttadosappasaṅgato. Tatrāpi hi samānādhikaraṇabhāve sati etaṁ buddhadhammasaṅghasaraṇaṁ
atk-s0501a1:21_11: paṭihatacittopi āgamma sabbadukkhā pamucceyyāti evaṁ pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva
atk-s0501a1:21_12: siyā, na ca no dosena atthi atthoti asādhakametaṁ. Yathā ‘‘mamañhi, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṁ
atk-s0501a1:21_13: āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccantī’’ti (saṁ. ni. 1.129) ettha bhagavato
atk-s0501a1:21_14: kalyāṇamittassa ānubhāvena parimuccamānā sattā ‘‘kalyāṇamittaṁ āgamma parimuccantī’’ti
atk-s0501a1:21_15: vuttā. Evamidhāpi buddhadhammasaṅghassa saraṇassānubhāvena muccamāno ‘‘etaṁ saraṇamāgamma,
atk-s0501a1:21_16: sabbadukkhā pamuccatī’’ti vuttoti evamettha adhippāyo veditabbo.
atk-s0501a1:22: Evaṁ sabbathāpi na buddhassa gamanīyattaṁ yujjati, na saraṇassa, na ubhayesaṁ, icchitabbañca gacchāmīti niddiṭṭhassa gamakassa gamanīyaṁ, tato vattabbā ettha yuttīti. Vuccate –
atk-s0501a1:23_0: Buddhoyevettha gamanīyo, gamanākāradassanatthaṁ tu taṁ saraṇavacanaṁ, buddhaṁ saraṇanti
atk-s0501a1:23_1: gacchāmi. Esa me saraṇaṁ, esa me parāyaṇaṁ, aghassa, tātā, hitassa ca vidhātāti iminā
atk-s0501a1:23_2: adhippāyena etaṁ gacchāmi bhajāmi sevāmi payirupāsāmi, evaṁ vā jānāmi bujjhāmīti.
atk-s0501a1:23_3: Yesañhi dhātūnaṁ gatiattho buddhipi tesaṁ atthoti. Iti-saddassa appayogā ayuttamiti
atk-s0501a1:23_4: ce? Taṁ na. Tattha siyā – yadi cettha evamattho bhaveyya, tato ‘‘aniccaṁ rūpaṁ aniccaṁ
atk-s0501a1:23_5: rūpanti yathābhūtaṁ pajānātī’’ti evamādīsu (saṁ. ni. 3.55, 85) viya iti-saddo payutto
atk-s0501a1:23_6: siyā, na ca payutto, tasmā ayuttametanti. Tañca na, kasmā? Tadatthasambhavā. ‘‘Yo
atk-s0501a1:23_7: ca buddhañca dhammañca saṅghañca saraṇaṁ gato’’ti evamādīsu (dha. pa. 190) viya idhāpi
atk-s0501a1:23_8: iti-saddassa attho sambhavati, na ca vijjamānatthasambhavā iti-saddā sabbattha payujjanti,
atk-s0501a1:23_9: appayuttassāpettha payuttassa viya iti-saddassa attho viññātabbo aññesu ca evaṁjātikesu,
atk-s0501a1:23_10: tasmā adoso eva soti. ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajja’’ntiādīsu
atk-s0501a1:23_11: (mahāva. 34) saraṇasseva gamanīyato yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘gamanākāradassanatthaṁ tu saraṇavacana’’nti,
atk-s0501a1:23_12: taṁ na yuttamiti ce. Taṁ nāyuttaṁ. Kasmā? Tadatthasambhavā eva. Tatrāpi hi tassa
atk-s0501a1:23_13: attho sambhavati, yato pubbasadisameva appayuttopi payutto viya veditabbo. Itarathā
atk-s0501a1:23_14: hi pubbe vuttadosappasaṅgo eva siyā, tasmā yathānusiṭṭhameva gahetabbaṁ.
atk-s0501a1:26_0: Idāni yaṁ vuttaṁ ‘‘dhammaṁ saraṇamiccādi, dvayepesa nayo mato’’ti ettha vuccate –
atk-s0501a1:26_1: yvāyaṁ ‘‘buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti ettha atthavaṇṇanānayo vutto, ‘‘dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ
atk-s0501a1:26_2: gacchāmi, saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmī’’ti etasmimpi padadvaye esova veditabbo. Tatrāpi
atk-s0501a1:26_3: hi dhammasaṅghānaṁ atthato byañjanato ca vibhāvanamattameva asadisaṁ, sesaṁ vuttasadisameva.
atk-s0501a1:26_4: Yato yadevettha asadisaṁ, taṁ vuccate – maggaphalanibbānāni dhammoti eke. Bhāvitamaggānaṁ
atk-s0501a1:26_5: sacchikatanibbānānañca apāyesu apatanabhāvena dhāraṇato paramassāsavidhānato ca maggavirāgā
atk-s0501a1:26_6: eva imasmiṁ atthe dhammoti amhākaṁ khanti, aggappasādasuttañceva sādhakaṁ. Vuttañcettha
atk-s0501a1:26_7: ‘‘yāvatā, bhikkhave, dhammā saṅkhatā , ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo tesaṁ aggamakkhāyatī’’ti
atk-s0501a1:27: Catubbidhaariyamaggasamaṅgīnaṁ catusāmaññaphalasamadhivāsitakhandhasantānānañca puggalānaṁ samūho diṭṭhisīlasaṅghātena saṁhatattā saṅgho. Vuttañcetaṁ bhagavatā –
atk-s0501a1:28_0: ‘‘Taṁ kiṁ maññasi, ānanda, ye vo mayā dhammā abhiññā desitā, seyyathidaṁ, cattāro
atk-s0501a1:28_1: satipaṭṭhānā, cattāro sammappadhānā, cattāro iddhipādā, pañcindriyāni, pañca balāni,
atk-s0501a1:28_2: satta bojjhaṅgā, ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo, passasi no tvaṁ, ānanda, imesu dhammesu
atk-s0501a1:29_0: Ayañhi paramatthasaṅgho saraṇanti gamanīyo. Sutte ca ‘‘āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo
atk-s0501a1:29_1: añjalikaraṇīyo anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ lokassā’’ti (itivu. 90; a. ni. 4.34, 181)
atk-s0501a1:29_2: vutto. Etaṁ pana saraṇaṁ gatassa aññasmimpi bhikkhusaṅghe vā bhikkhunisaṅghe vā buddhappamukhe
atk-s0501a1:29_3: vā saṅghe sammutisaṅghe vā catuvaggādibhede ekapuggalepi vā bhagavantaṁ uddissa pabbajite
atk-s0501a1:29_4: vandanādikiriyāya saraṇagamanaṁ neva bhijjati na saṁkilissati, ayamettha viseso.
atk-s0501a1:29_5: Vuttāvasesantu imassa dutiyassa ca saraṇagamanassa bhedābhedādividhānaṁ pubbe vuttanayeneva
atk-s0501a1:29_6: veditabbaṁ. Ayaṁ tāva ‘‘dhammaṁ saraṇamiccādi, dvayepesa nayo mato’’ti etassa vaṇṇanā.
atk-s0501a1:31_0: Idāni anupubbavavatthāne, kāraṇañca viniddiseti ettha etesu ca tīsu saraṇavacanesu
atk-s0501a1:31_1: sabbasattānaṁ aggoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho, tappabhavato tadupadesitato ca anantaraṁ
atk-s0501a1:31_2: dhammo, tassa dhammassa ādhārakato tadāsevanato ca ante saṅgho. Sabbasattānaṁ vā
atk-s0501a1:31_3: hite niyojakoti katvā paṭhamaṁ buddho, tappabhavato sabbasattahitattā anantaraṁ dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:31_4: hitādhigamāya paṭipanno adhigatahito cāti katvā ante saṅgho saraṇabhāvena vavatthapetvā
atk-s0501a1:33_0: Idāni yampi vuttaṁ ‘‘saraṇattayametañca, upamāhi pakāsaye’’ti , tampi vuccate – ettha
atk-s0501a1:33_1: pana puṇṇacando viya buddho, candakiraṇanikaro viya tena desito dhammo, puṇṇacandakiraṇasamuppāditapīṇito
atk-s0501a1:33_2: loko viya saṅgho. Bālasūriyo viya buddho, tassa rasmijālamiva vuttappakāro dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:33_3: tena vihatandhakāro loko viya saṅgho. Vanadāhakapuriso viya buddho, vanadahanaggi
atk-s0501a1:33_4: viya kilesavanadahano dhammo, daḍḍhavanattā khettabhūto viya bhūmibhāgo daḍḍhakilesattā
atk-s0501a1:33_5: puññakkhettabhūto saṅgho. Mahāmegho viya buddho, salilavuṭṭhi viya dhammo, vuṭṭhinipātūpasamitareṇu
atk-s0501a1:33_6: viya janapado upasamitakilesareṇu saṅgho. Susārathi viya buddho, assājānīyavinayūpāyo
atk-s0501a1:33_7: viya dhammo, suvinītassājānīyasamūho viya saṅgho. Sabbadiṭṭhisalluddharaṇato sallakatto
atk-s0501a1:33_8: viya buddho, salluddharaṇūpāyo viya dhammo, samuddhaṭasallo viya jano samuddhaṭadiṭṭhisallo
atk-s0501a1:33_9: saṅgho. Mohapaṭalasamuppāṭanato vā sālākiyo viya buddho, paṭalasamuppāṭanupāyo viya
atk-s0501a1:33_10: dhammo, samuppāṭitapaṭalo vippasannalocano viya jano samuppāṭitamohapaṭalo vippasannañāṇalocano
atk-s0501a1:33_11: saṅgho. Sānusayakilesabyādhiharaṇasamatthatāya vā kusalo vejjo viya buddho, sammā
atk-s0501a1:33_12: payuttabhesajjamiva dhammo, bhesajjapayogena samupasantabyādhi viya janasamudāyo
atk-s0501a1:34_0: Atha vā sudesako viya buddho, sumaggo viya khemantabhūmi viya ca dhammo, maggappaṭipanno
atk-s0501a1:34_1: khemantabhūmippatto viya saṅgho. Sunāviko viya buddho, nāvā viya dhammo, pārappatto
atk-s0501a1:34_2: sampattiko viya jano saṅgho. Himavā viya buddho, tappabhavosadhamiva dhammo, osadhūpabhogena
atk-s0501a1:34_3: nirāmayo viya jano saṅgho. Dhanado viya buddho, dhanaṁ viya dhammo, yathādhippāyaṁ
atk-s0501a1:34_4: laddhadhano viya jano sammāladdhaariyadhano saṅgho. Nidhidassanako viya buddho, nidhi
atk-s0501a1:34_5: viya dhammo, nidhippatto viya jano saṅgho.
atk-s0501a1:35_0: Apica abhayado viya vīrapuriso buddho, abhayamiva dhammo, sampattābhayo viya jano
atk-s0501a1:35_1: accantasabbabhayo saṅgho. Assāsako viya buddho, assāso viya dhammo, assatthajano
atk-s0501a1:35_2: viya saṅgho. Sumitto viya buddho, hitūpadeso viya dhammo, hitūpayogena pattasadattho
atk-s0501a1:35_3: viya jano saṅgho. Dhanākaro viya buddho, dhanasāro viya dhammo, dhanasārūpabhogo
atk-s0501a1:35_4: viya jano saṅgho. Rājakumāranhāpako viya buddho, sīsanhānasalilaṁ viya dhammo, sunhātarājakumāravaggo
atk-s0501a1:35_5: viya saddhammasalilasunhāto saṅgho. Alaṅkārakārako viya buddho, alaṅkāro viya dhammo,
atk-s0501a1:35_6: alaṅkatarājaputtagaṇo viya saddhammālaṅkato saṅgho. Candanarukkho viya buddho, tappabhavagandho
atk-s0501a1:35_7: viya dhammo, candanupabhogena santapariḷāho viya jano saddhammūpabhogena santapariḷāho
atk-s0501a1:35_8: saṅgho. Dāyajjasampadānako viya pitā buddho, dāyajjaṁ viya dhammo, dāyajjaharo puttavaggo
atk-s0501a1:35_9: viya saddhammadāyajjaharo saṅgho. Vikasitapadumaṁ viya buddho, tappabhavamadhu viya
atk-s0501a1:35_10: dhammo, tadupabhogībhamaragaṇo viya saṅgho. Evaṁ saraṇattayametañca, upamāhi pakāsaye.
atk-s0501a1:36: Ettāvatā ca yā pubbe ‘‘kena kattha kadā kasmā, bhāsitaṁ saraṇattaya’’ntiādīhi catūhi gāthāhi atthavaṇṇanāya mātikā nikkhittā, sā atthato pakāsitā hotīti.
